ghost.banshee.name: Banshee
ghost.banshee.strength: Only targets one player at a time.
ghost.banshee.weakness: Has a distinctive wail on the Parabolic Microphone.
ghost.demon.name: Demon
ghost.jinn.name: Jinn
ghost.jinn.strength: Travels at faster speeds if its victim is far away.
ghost.jinn.weakness: Cannot use its ability if the site's fuse box is off.
ghost.mare.name: Mare
ghost.mare.strength: Has an increased chance to attack in the dark.
ghost.mare.weakness: Turning the lights on will reduce the chance of an attack.
ghost.oni.name: Oni
ghost.oni.weakness: An Oni's increased activity makes them easier to find.
ghost.phantom.name: Phantom
ghost.phantom.strength: Looking at a Phantom will lower the player's sanity considerably.
ghost.phantom.weakness: Taking a photo of the Phantom will cause it to briefly disappear, not during a hunt.
ghost.poltergeist.name: Poltergeist
ghost.poltergeist.strength: Capable of throwing multiple objects at once.
ghost.poltergeist.weakness: Becomes powerless with no throwables nearby.
ghost.revenant.name: Revenant
ghost.revenant.strength: Can travel significantly faster if a player is spotted during a hunt.
ghost.revenant.weakness: Moves very slowly when not chasing a player.
ghost.shade.name: Shade
ghost.shade.strength: Being shy makes it more difficult to locate and obtain evidence.
ghost.shade.weakness: Less likely to hunt if multiple people are nearby.
ghost.spirit.name: Spirit
ghost.spirit.weakness: Smudge sticks are more effective, preventing a hunt for longer.
ghost.wraith.name: Wraith
ghost.wraith.strength: Does not leave UV footprints after stepping in salt.
ghost.wraith.weakness: Will become more active if it steps in salt.
ghost.yurei.name: Yurei
ghost.yurei.strength: Has a stronger effect on sanity.
ghost.yurei.weakness: Smudging the Yurei's ghost room will reduce how often it wanders.
ghost.yokai.name: Yokai
ghost.yokai.strength: Talking near the Yokai will anger it, increasing the chance to attack.
ghost.yokai.weakness: Can only hear voices close to it during a hunt.
ghost.hantu.name: Hantu
ghost.hantu.strength: Lower temperatures allow the Hantu to move faster.
ghost.hantu.weakness: Warmer areas slow the Hantu's movement.
ghost.goryo.name: Goryo
ghost.goryo.strength: Can only be seen interacting with D.O.T.S. through a camera when nobody is nearby.
ghost.goryo.weakness: Tends to wander away less from its ghost room.
ghost.myling.name: Myling
ghost.myling.strength: Has quieter footsteps during a hunt.
ghost.onryo.name: Onryo
ghost.onryo.strength: A flame extinguishing can cause an Onryo to attack.
ghost.onryo.weakness: The presence of flames reduces the Onryo's ability to attack.
ghost.twins.name: The Twins
ghost.twins.strength: Either Twin may start a hunt, though not at the same time..
ghost.twins.weakness: Will often interact with the environment at the same time.
ghost.obake.name: Obake
ghost.obake.strength: May leave fingerprints that disappear quicker.
ghost.obake.weakness: Has a small chance of leaving six-fingered handprints.
ghost.raiju.name: Raiju
ghost.raiju.weakness: Disrupts electronic equipment from further away when it hunts.
ghost.mimic.name: The Mimic
ghost.mimic.strength: Can mimic the abilities and traits of other ghosts.
ghost.mimic.weakness: Will present Ghost Orbs as a secondary evidence..
question.radio.aggression.3: Do you want to hurt us?
question.radio.aggression.8: Do you want us to leave?
question.radio.location.5: Let us know you are here.
question.radio.misc.3: What do you want to eat?
question.radio.misc.4: Do you want to build a snowman?
question.radio.misc.5: Do you want a bro job?
question.ouija.victim.3: What is the name of the person you killed?
question.ouija.victim.4: What is the name of the person you murdered?
question.ouija.death.1: How long have you been dead?
question.ouija.death.2: How many years ago did you die?
question.ouija.death.3: How long have you been here?
question.ouija.death.4: How long ago did you die?
question.ouija.room.1: How many are in this room?
question.ouija.room.2: How many people are in this room?
question.ouija.room.4: How many ghosts are in this room?
